post.body: I just got back from a sick workout! I'm pumped! (This will last for about an hour before I want to curl up in bed and hibernate).
it's always worth it! :)
People r already calling u a cute Carrie Fischer. I could tell them to follow u but then u would surpass me in followers! ;) haha jk
Did I hear beta test? Whatever it is... count. me. in!
Hahaha it means that I think the only correct answer to "yes or yes?" must be yes.
Umm... I want to use one of my life lines.
and @maczter thanks guys! Found it online. Duh. Can't believe I wasted time. (I had tried looking before but I guess not hard enough).
I had yogurt for dinner. Me: I had soup. Arielle: They both require spoons.
Aria, people thought you were cute. Now I'm jealous.
oh and by the way... if u are gonna have 80+ followers, you're gonna have to step it up in quality of tweets. You're boring me.
yes, it really happened. And @dam00n, it was at the restaurant, not metro.
...or you could save yourself a ton of time and use FixTunes. C'mon, you gotta be smarter than the average bear.
yes... 3 ppl...and have heard of countless more
why?? that's so random!
U can't just announce the beginning of an official NYC winter w/ "little baby snowflakes"...I was about to go make a snowman! :P
where?! I don't see it??
I would love to go to SXSW, but I'm a college student and poor and I don't know if I'll find the $$. Tried ChipIn, but no luck. :S
http://twitpic.com/r3as - oh Lewis... I can't believe you took this photo
triathlon! and it's gonna kick my ass... so I better crash NOW. g'night! :)
Haha you're a dork. I hope I get to see you this break!!
I didn't actually get to see the whole movie... just a scene for my class about Hollywood & Blacklist Era.
hahah now THAT'S funny!! :)
I'll totally get lunch... I leave on Wednesday... so I can do any of these next days... :)
sorry i didn't make it to the mediabistro event last night :( I had to study for my final and I didn't remember to text you. Bad form.
no xmas tree.... this is NYC! If I want a tree I go to Rockefeller center :)
very good advice! (Same for everyone else who replied to me at this ungodly hour ;) Thanks!)
It's due Monday, but I also have a QR Stats exam on Monday & I wanted to spend all of tomorrow studying 4 it b/c I know NOTHING!
I can't believe you! Partying it up at the Beverly Hilton?? I'm jealous.
Agreed. I like to think he invented the internet. And thus, I refer to him as "Dad."
I feel so M.I.A.! I miss the room and the loud neighbors.
I almost feel like just taking out the popcorn and sitting down to read your tweets. Wild!
oh no!!
I am very much taken, haha.
it's 80 and sunny out here in Cali
Not too busy yet so I'll let u know if I can go this weekend, but if something comes up then go see it & we can see diff 1 l8r.
Well if you have a chance, by all means go ahead without me, don't want to hold u back!
I'm ready to graduate
touche :)
even if your wife is okay with it... perhaps the other women will not be. Have you considered that? If so, best of luck!
...not only that... but a married man who is planning on being involved with other women besides this woman.
I read your polyamory post. But my question is where you'll find all these women who want to be involved with a married man.
"Power Vinyasa Flow" http://yogatothepeople.com :)
*yawn* ...goodnight :)
Finished my paper!!! Success! (2 hours later than I would've hoped... but oh well).
Is everyone now following my best friend @Vanessa6 as I said yesterday? Oh, you are? Jeez, sorry... just making sure. Awesome. kthxbai.
Hack College is giving away some HP gear! Mah college buddies shud checkz it out. www.hackcollege.com/magic
I meant I have to write a paper about the book.
I'm screwed. I have to write a book about City of Sun by Tommasso Campanella, but I haven't read it and there are no copies in library. :(
Heading to NYU library to write the last paper for my Renaissance Italy class. Grrr.
http://twitpic.com/pr4c - I just discovered a sad fact: All the scarves I own are PINK! Why??
Every time a person in my class asks "what's a tag cloud?" A tag fairy loses its wings. And I pull my hair out.
http://twitpic.com/ppuw - Drew this girl in class. Her name is Revi.
http://twitpic.com/ppt7 - @ajve look Aria! It's u in class haha. You're gonna laugh when u see this.
Guys should never tell girls they "look tired." WTF? A) We know, thank you... and B) It's b/c we're not wearing makeup. DUH. Fool.
Heading to kill it at the pool this morning. Woo!!
Had already showered & was about to lie in bed & watch a movie... but then got a burst of energy and now heading to the gym. I'm ridiculous.
Man at Subway: "You don't have working restrooms? Where am I supposed to go?? Fuck you! FUCK YOU ALL!!" And he storms out. End of Act 1.
Retweeting @Armano: This is brilliant. http://niemann.blogs.nytimes.com/
I feel like I am going to die. Cramps for two days straight... no amount of tylenol or advil is helping. Feeling tired and groggy and upset.
Finishing up my profile on CollegeHumor. Do you visit the site? What do you like about it? (If you want to expand, email me: alanatay@gmail)
http://twitpic.com/qt9z - Watching one of my fave movies: You've Got Mail :)
Here's a link to the bracelet http://tinyurl.com/6pyzw9
Barely heard about the iPod Shuffle Bracelet... looks hot. Definitely don't need it though. Really need a digital camera. Sigh.
I really need to do homework. Just 9 days of school left. I can do this.
Watching redbelt... Great movie so far
Can you help me? http://tinyurl.com/5lw6nw
I can't believe I'm going to sleep so late! Got training in less than 4 hours! Aghh
http://twitpic.com/r3re - Lewis is going to make me a LinkedIn maven... Watch out
http://twitpic.com/r3c4 - Having dinner with Lewis Howes, coolest guy in sports industry :)
Why can't the Twitter homepage update in real-time the way it did on it's Election 08 page?
Dude is gonna lifecast through a camera in his eyeball. That's hardcore: http://tinyurl.com/6k43wm
Just checked out PeopleBrowsr. Not very interested in it though.
Watching Woody Allen's "The Front" in class.
Yayy, so many people have given me great tips and advice so far: http://tinyurl.com/5lw6nw. Do you have any?
Is there any way to hide/stop the tab that opens and lists all your downloads (ever) on Google Chrome after you download something?
Is there anything (not drugs) that you can take/eat to make you really happy? I drank too much caffeine and now crashing/ feeling depressed.
http://twitpic.com/rocr - WTF?! This pisses me off. How else should I endorse my paper??
The cheaper the umbrella = sign of hardcore New Yorker.
http://twitpic.com/sw36 - In a cab.
Retweeting @ArielleRubin: Check out @AntlerDarts to win a ticket to band, Of Montreal, in NYC on 12/16!
Finished my paper!! 5:34am! Now to sleep.
9 pages done. Paper has to be 10-15 pages. It's 3:50am. Should I stop or follow through to the finish line?
http://twitpic.com/sppi - @ArielleRubin's comp just freaked out big time. Not a good time! Finals week!!
You know what would really motivate me to finish studying for finals? A few thousand more followers on Twitter, haha. :)
Great lunch with @ajve! Now walking home and I am freezing!!!!!
Cutest thing I've ever seen: http://tinyurl.com/5axfwh
I want to find out all the things that are good luck on New Year's so I can do them ALL.
A friend just called to tell me they saw an ad for my blog on Facebook. How does that happen??
http://twitpic.com/uksk - My dog Opie stood over me until I woke up.
http://twitpic.com/uidl - Look who's happy to see me!
About to watch Yes Man.
Al final de cuentas, no me voy a Mexicali. Me voy a quedar en San Diego con mi hermano.
I'm trying to get more fans on Facebook :) http://tinyurl.com/4kdl8t/pages/Alana-Taylor/18360104634
http://twitpic.com/ucrc - My parents: happily married 24 years :)
http://twitpic.com/ucpq - Having a cup of coffee by the water
http://twitpic.com/ubvh - Having lunch at my fav restaraunt: The Fish Market
http://twitpic.com/ubrt - U.S.S. Midway
http://twitpic.com/ubrb - Downtown San Diego
http://twitpic.com/ubnx - San Diego will always be my home. Nothing beats this weather!
http://twitpic.com/ub6c - Just landed in San Diego.
http://twitpic.com/ub5t - The view from above
http://twitpic.com/ub43 - Inside of my kaleidescope
Song of the day: All I Wanna Do -- Sheryl Crow :)
Walked into Think Coffee this morning with only enough change for a small latte and I was offered a free bagel! Life is good :)
At the Gansevoort with an old friend from high school! Finally--someone to catch up with :)
My new year's resolutions :) http://tinyurl.com/7at36p
Morning all! Hope everyone had fun last night :)
http://twitpic.com/ykhx - Spot my name on the New Years Wall
HAPPY NEw YEAR Twitter!!!
http://twitpic.com/yjqy - 30 min countdown!
http://twitpic.com/yipr - At house party on 36 and 10!
This house I'm at is ridiculously huge. With @ottocedeno and others. No more blogging!!
Omg if ur in NYC look up at the moon. Looks like straight from a storybook :)
